org.jetel.component

Interface Transform

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataRecord2JmsMsg, GraphParameterValueFunction, JavaRunnable, JmsMsg2DataRecord, PartitionFunction, RecordDenormalize, RecordGenerate, RecordNormalize, RecordRollup, RecordTransform
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTransform, AbstractTransformTL, BasicJavaRunnable, CTLAbstractTransform, CTLAbstractTransformAdapter, CTLGraphParameterValueTransform, CTLGraphParameterValueTransformAdapter, CTLRecordDenormalize, CTLRecordDenormalizeAdapter, CTLRecordFilter, CTLRecordGenerate, CTLRecordGenerateAdapter, CTLRecordNormalize, CTLRecordNormalizeAdapter, CTLRecordPartition, CTLRecordPartitionAdapter, CTLRecordRollup, CTLRecordRollupAdapter, CTLRecordTransform, CTLRecordTransformAdapter, CustomizedRecordTransform, DataPartitionFunction, DataRecord2JmsMsgBase, DataRecord2JmsMsgProperties, DataRecordDenormalize, DataRecordGenerate, DataRecordNormalize, DataRecordRollup, DataRecordTransform, ExtDataGenerator.NullRecordGenerator, HashPartition, JmsMsg2DataRecordBase, JmsMsg2DataRecordProperties, PartitionTL, RangePartition, RangePartitionOld, RecordDenormalizeTL, RecordGenerateTL, RecordNormalizeTL, RecordRollupTL, RecordTransformTL, RoundRobinPartition

    public interface Transform
    Common transform interface which defines methods common to all transforms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finished()
      Deprecated. 
      Use postExecute() method.
      TransformationGraph getGraph() 
      java.lang.String getMessage()
      Called to report any user-defined error message if an error occurred during the transform.
      Node getNode() 
      void postExecute()
      Called during each graph run after the entire transform was executed.
      void preExecute()
      Called during each graph run before the transform is executed.
      void reset()
      Deprecated. 
      Use preExecute() method.
      void setNode(Node node)
      Associates a graph Node with this transform.

    • Method Detail

      • setNode

        void setNode(Node node)
        Associates a graph Node with this transform.
        Parameters:
        node - a graph Node to be associated

      • getNode

        Node getNode()
        Returns:
        a graph Node associated with this transform, or null if no graph node is associated

      • getGraph

        TransformationGraph getGraph()
        Returns:
        a TransformationGraph associated with this transform, or null if no graph is associated

      • preExecute

        void preExecute()
                throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Called during each graph run before the transform is executed. May be used to allocate and initialize resources required by the transform. All resources allocated within this method should be released by the postExecute() method.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if an error occurred during resource allocation and initialization

      • postExecute

        void postExecute()
                 throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Called during each graph run after the entire transform was executed. Should be used to free any resources allocated within the preExecute() method.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if an error occurred during resource clean-up

      • getMessage

        java.lang.String getMessage()
        Called to report any user-defined error message if an error occurred during the transform.
        Returns:
        a user-defined error message if an error occurred

      • finished

        @Deprecated
void finished()
        Deprecated. Use postExecute() method.
        Called at the end of the transform after all input data records were processed.

      • reset

        @Deprecated
void reset()
        Deprecated. Use preExecute() method.
        Resets the transform to the initial state (for another execution). This method may be called only if the transform was successfully initialized before.
